creditCardName: Bank of America® Customized Cash Rewards

bonuses.details: Earn 3% cashback in the category of your choice, such as gas, online shopping, dining, travel, drugstores, or home improvement.
Earn 2% cashback at grocery stores and wholesale clubs on the first $2,500 in combined choice category/grocery store/wholesale club purchases each quarter.
Earn 1% cashback on all other purchases.

fees.balanceTransferFee: $10 or 3% of the amount of each transfer, whichever is greater.

bonuses.details: Earn 5% cashback on everyday purchases at different places each quarter, up to the quarterly maximum when you activate.
Earn 1% cashback on all other purchases.

fees.balanceTransferFee: $5 or 3% of the amount of each transfer, whichever is greater.

bonuses.details: Earn 2% cashback on all purchases: 1% when you buy and 1% as you pay.

Earn 3% cashback at U.S. gas stations.

fees.balanceTransferFee: $5 or 3% of the amount of each transfer, whichever is greater.

bonuses.details: Earn 5x points on travel purchased through Chase Ultimate Rewards.
Earn 2x points on dining at restaurants and other travel purchases.
